description.narrative: By 2014, government systems have the capacity to design multi-sectoral strategies that address and monitor under nutrition, and then plan nutrition interventions that identify and reach the most disadvantaged girls and boys, which contributes to Nutrition â€“ General, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Disadvantaged children benefit from interventions to reduce stunting

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
